rev.desc.rev.desc: Missing statement in RAD:sla.compute.means, panel: set.sql
Total time of slo reponse is '00:00' will be included into sla response stat,
$L.sql="agreement.id="+$L.sla+" and slo.id="+slo.id in $L.slo+" and total.time>'00:00' and end.time<='"+$L.eom+"' and end.time>='"+$L.fom+"'" $L.sql=nullsub($L.sql, "false")
$L.sql="agreement.id="+$L.sla+" and slo.id="+slo.id in $L.slo+" and end.time<='"+$L.eom+"' and end.time>='"+$L.fom+"'" $L.sql=nullsub($L.sql, "false")
Modified to use 0-100 percentage rather than 0-1. Also bases precision on value in SLA environment.
No longer count no-ops (00:00 elapsed time) in these reports.
Modified to read new data from clocks and slaactive table, also includes total records affected and total breaches.
Moved clock.count to after select.clocks so that slaresponse file is updated correctly
Added "total" field to the select.clocks panel so that the median value can be set properly.
